question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Fundamental Rights?
option2: They may be suspended on the will of President
option3: They can be suspended by an order of Prime Minister
option4: They may be suspended during Emergency
answer: They may be suspended during Emergency
explanation: The Fundamental Rights can only be suspended during an Emergency. The provisions for Emergency has been given under Article 358 and 359 of the Constitution. Fundamental Rights are our natural rights and are non-transferable rights.
